Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.util

Class ImageRepository

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.util.ImageRepository
public class ImageRepository
extends java.lang.Object
Used to load images once for performance and memory usage reasons [Singleton]

    • getImageStream

      private java.io.InputStream getImageStream​(java.lang.String filename, java.lang.String folderName)
      Helper function to retrieve resource graphics path
      Parameters:
      filename - Name of the image file
      folderName - Name of the folder containing the image file (USE DOTS INSTEAD OF SLASHES)
      Returns:
      InputStream of the image

    • getPersonalBoardImage

      public java.awt.Image getPersonalBoardImage​(boolean coloured) throws ImagesNotLoadedException
      Returns the PersonalBoard's image file
      Parameters:
      coloured - true -> returns coloured version, false -> returns black and white version
      Returns:
      The requested image
      Throws:
      ImagesNotLoadedException - When loadAllGraphics has not yet been successfully called

    • getMarketBoardImage

      public java.awt.Image getMarketBoardImage() throws ImagesNotLoadedException

      Returns:
      The requested image
      Throws:
      ImagesNotLoadedException - When loadAllGraphics has not yet been successfully called

    • getCardImage

      public java.awt.Image getCardImage​(int id) throws ImagesNotLoadedException, UnregisteredCardIDException
      Returns the Card's image file
      Parameters:
      id - Card id
      Returns:
      The requested image
      Throws:
      ImagesNotLoadedException - When loadAllGraphics has not yet been successfully called
      UnregisteredCardIDException - When the requested Card ID is not associated with a loaded card

    • getVaticanReportSignal

      public java.awt.Image getVaticanReportSignal​(int index, boolean enabled) throws ImagesNotLoadedException
      Returns the Vatican Reports's image file
      Parameters:
      index - 1, 2 or 3 (Index of the vatican report space)
      enabled - Enabled or disabled vatican space?
      Returns:
      The requested image
      Throws:
      ImagesNotLoadedException - When loadAllGraphics has not yet been successfully called

    • getResourceImage

      public java.awt.Image getResourceImage​(Resource resource) throws ImagesNotLoadedException, ResourceTypeNotSupportedException
      Returns the Resource's image file
      Parameters:
      resource - Requested resource
      Returns:
      The requested image
      Throws:
      ImagesNotLoadedException - When loadAllGraphics has not yet been successfully called
      ResourceTypeNotSupportedException - When resource type is White / Generic / Faith

      public java.awt.Image getMarbleImage​(Resource resource, boolean hasWhiteMarbleSubstitution) throws ImagesNotLoadedException, ResourceTypeNotSupportedException
      Returns the Marble's image file
      Parameters:
      resource - Resource corresponding to the marble colour
      hasWhiteMarbleSubstitution - Whether or not the Player has an active WMS Leader Card
      Returns:
      The requested image
      Throws:
      ImagesNotLoadedException - When loadAllGraphics has not yet been successfully called
      ResourceTypeNotSupportedException - When resource type is Generic
